    • Method Detail

      • getMessages

        public abstract List<Message> getMessages()
        Retrieve messages that this tailer has been notified of.
        Returns:
        Messages we are aware of, in their original order.

      • getWatch

        protected LogWatch getWatch()

      • isTerminated

        public boolean isTerminated()

      • notifyOfLine

        protected abstract void notifyOfLine(String line)
        Notify the tailer of a new line in the watched log. Must never be called by users, just from the library code.
        Parameters:
        line - The line.

      • notifyOfMessage

        protected abstract void notifyOfMessage(Message msg)
        Notify the tailer of a new message in the watched log. Must never be called by users, just from the library code.
        Parameters:
        msg - The message.

      • tag

        public abstract void tag(String tagLine)
        Mark the current location in the tail by a custom message. It is up to the implementors to decide whether or not a tag inserted at the same time twice is inserted twice, or the second tag overwrites the first.
        Parameters:
        tagLine - Text of the message.

      • waitFor

        public abstract String waitFor(LineCondition condition)
        Will block until a line appears in the log, for which the condition is true.
        Parameters:
        condition - Condition that needs to be true for the method to unblock.
        Returns:
        Null if the method unblocked due to some other reason.

      • waitFor

        public abstract String waitFor(LineCondition condition,
             long timeout,
             TimeUnit unit)
        Will block until a line appears in the log, for which the condition is true. If none appears before the timeout, it unblocks anyway.
        Parameters:
        condition - Condition that needs to be true for the method to unblock.
        Returns:
        Null if the method unblocked due to some other reason.

      • waitFor

        public abstract Message waitFor(MessageCondition condition)
        Will block until a message arrives, for which the condition is true.
        Parameters:
        condition - Condition that needs to be true for the method to unblock.
        Returns:
        Null if the method unblocked due to some other reason.

      • waitFor

        public abstract Message waitFor(MessageCondition condition,
              long timeout,
              TimeUnit unit)
        Will block until a message arrives, for which the condition is true. If none arrives before the timeout, it unblocks anyway.
        Parameters:
        condition - Condition that needs to be true for the method to unblock.
        Returns:
        Null if the method unblocked due to some other reason.

      • write

        public boolean write(OutputStream stream)
        Will output all the messages, including tags, into a stream.
        Parameters:
        stream - Target.
        Returns:
        True if written, false otherwise.

      • write

        public boolean write(OutputStream stream,
            BooleanCondition<Message> condition)
        Will output the messages, including tags, that meet a specific condition, into a stream.
        Parameters:
        stream - Target.
        condition - When this object's MessageCondition#accept(Message) returns true on a message, the message will be included in the stream.
        Returns:
        True if written, false otherwise.
